db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to display information about serial devices in a system.

db:article.db:para: Enumerator shows how to use the class QSerialPortInfo for getting information about serial devices that are present in the system.
This GUI example displays information about serial ports in a widget, provided by the class QSerialPortInfo.
For getting information about the available ports, use the static method availablePorts().

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
